channel.title: 883 Days
channel.description:
[b]Posts: 883 (1 per day) [/b]
Which meants that I have been here for exactly 883 days. I've met alot of people since I first registered, lost a lot of old friends when they quit private servers, and now there are just a few moparscaper's left from that long ago. Most of them are now Moparscape Vets, but a few of them were actually Moparscape Community Members (Moparscape CM) back in the day. Some of the people that were active when I registered and are still active are: [ul][li]Taharok[/li] [li]Lin[/li] [li]Telenubby[/li] [li]P I M P E D T U T[/li] [li]and obviously alot that I have not named[/li][/ul]
The only reason I posted this is because I am proud to have been here for so long (883 days), and I am glad to see that there are still plenty of old members around.

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:44, topic:279634”]Gah finally someone broght this up, ive actually had quite alot of accounts on Moparscape Fourms

To be exact I 4, 1 of them were banned. And basicly all of them i forgot my password. Different Emails different passwords.

Im not sure how long ive been playing, well ive been playing a little longer than some people on here, but not sure how much people.

Mr Mopar I think i registered on my other account about then aswell.[/quote]

Shhh, your only supposed to have one account.

item.title: 883 Days
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

From and including: Saturday, April 28, 2007 To, but not including : Friday, May 22, 2009

It is 755 days from the start date to the end date, but not including the end date

Or 2 years, 24 days excluding the end date

Alternative time units
755 days can be converted to one of these units:
65,232,000 seconds
1,087,200 minutes
18,120 hours
107 weeks (rounded down)

Read full topic

item.title: 883 Days
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:33, topic:279634”]964 days, 9 hours, 1 minute and 6 seconds
Or 2 years, 7 months, 21 days, 9 hours, 1 minute, 6 seconds

964 days, 9 hours, 1 minute and 6 seconds can be converted to one of these units:

[ul][li]83,322,066 seconds[/li]
[li]1,388,701 minutes (rounded down)[/li]
[li]23,145 hours (rounded down)[/li]
[li]137 weeks (rounded down)[/li][/ul]

http://www.timeanddate.com/date/duration.html

Total time logged in: 45 days, 6 hours and 47 minutes.

Combining all this up, I spent 4.7% of my time visiting this website since I registered.

:P[/quote]

and you’ve been a douchebag the entire time, mod taharok

item.title: 883 Days
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

964 days, 9 hours, 1 minute and 6 seconds
Or 2 years, 7 months, 21 days, 9 hours, 1 minute, 6 seconds

964 days, 9 hours, 1 minute and 6 seconds can be converted to one of these units:

[ul][li]83,322,066 seconds[/li]
[li]1,388,701 minutes (rounded down)[/li]
[li]23,145 hours (rounded down)[/li]
[li]137 weeks (rounded down)[/li][/ul]

http://www.timeanddate.com/date/duration.html

Total time logged in: 45 days, 6 hours and 47 minutes.

Combining all this up, I spent 4.7% of my time visiting this website since I registered.

item.title: 883 Days
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Liquicity:

Wish I knew how long I’ve been here, my other account was ban for using a spam catching email.

zoltanman:

I think I actually joined in August 06 on another account that got deleted or something. Idk though lol.

`Rich:

Just remembered, I have an account from August 06 or so, but forgot the password and created this account.

Girona:

Hmm, I actually had an account around October '06, not sure what happened to it. I went on a holiday came back tried logging in and it just wouldn’t accept my password or something. I try searching the username and it doesn’t exist. So one of the staff members must of deleted my account :o
